string-array.name: radio_button1
string-array.item: You like Muscle Cars:OldFashioned
You wear all the brand-name clothes:TheElvis
You are a conversation-starter:PBJSriracha
You are a fan of healthy foods:PBFruit
You haven\'t showered in a month:PBFruit
You are confident:TheElvis
You desire to live in a high-rise/penthouse condo:DoubleDecker
You are a dreamer:DeepFried
You have tons of Bling:TheElvis
You stockpile things that you like:DoubleDecker
You appreciate tried-and-true methods of doing things:OldFashioned
You feel uncomfortable when you are in a boring situation:PBJSriracha

string-array.name: radio_button2
string-array.item: You find camping very enjoyable:PBFruit
You are a collector:DoubleDecker
You like classic music:OldFashioned
You are an innovator:DeepFried
You are outgoing/extroverted:PBJSriracha
You like to fix things when they break:DeepFried
You consider yourself a fan of nature:PBFruit
You love being in the limelight:TheElvis
You upgrade your fast-food meals to large:DoubleDecker
You \"fake it \'til you make it\":TheElvis
You try to add excitement to every moment:PBJSriracha
You are a \"game-changer\":DeepFried

string-array.name: radio_button3
string-array.item: You put hot sauce on everything:PBJSriracha
You use a flip phone:OldFashioned
You don\'t buy anything that isn\'t labeled \"all-natural\":PBFruit
You \"strut your stuff\":TheElvis
You always \"treat yo self\":DoubleDecker
You decorate in vivid colors:PBJSriracha
You always think about how things can be improved:DeepFried
You prefer the nature trail to the mall:PBFruit
You firmly believe \"it if ain\'t broke, don\'t fix it\":OldFashioned
You have a very active mind:DeepFried
You think that kids these days need to play outside more:OldFashioned
You upgrade to new technology right when it comes out:DoubleDecker
